definitions.definition: belonging to or done by a particular person or thing:
examples: Each neighbourhood in New York has its own characteristics.
I like living on my own.
I did my buttons up all on my own, Dad .

definitions.definition: If you do something in your own time, you do it at the speed at which you want to work.
during the time when you are not officially working:
examples: You may only use company computers to access the Web in your own time.

definitions.definition: to have something that legally belongs to you:
